author: malbouis
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is to update the AlCaReco matrix to be used for the ReReco campaigns of EraABCD+E. It includes all the PDs that existed throughout the Eras.

#### PR validation:

`runTheMatrix.py -l 1001.2,1001.3,1002.3,1002.4 --ibeos`

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

This is not a backport but will be backported all the way to 124X.
title: Add all PDs from 2022 in AlCaReco Matrix
